title: Roasted Beet & Radish Salad With White Truffle Vinaigrette
summary: Roasted Beet & Radish Salad With White Truffle Vinaigrette is a gluten free, primal, and vegetarian recipe with 4 servings. One serving contains 319 calories, 9g of protein, and 20g of fat. For $3.57 per serving, this recipe covers 15% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe is liked by 29 foodies and cooks. It works well as a pretty expensive side dish. Head to the store and pick up radishes, balsamic vinegar, truffle oil, and a few other things to make it today. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 45 minutes. With a spoonacular score of 77%, this dish is solid. Try Shaved Golden Beet, Carrot and Radish Salad with Coriander Mustard Vinaigrette, Roasted Beet Salad with Garlic Vinaigrette, and Roasted Beet Salad with Citrus Vinaigrette for similar recipes.
